metadata.title: CarefreeTees Cats Meow Cat Lovers (Unisex Baby Bodysuit or Tee-Shirt)
features: Made in the USA or Imported
CarefreeTees Registered Brand - Thick Super Soft 100% Interlock Cotton
Design Printed From Vector Art Using Commercial Inks For a Sharp and Clear Image
Machine wash warm inside out, tumble dry
Standard fit - not too fitted, not too loose
3 Snap Closure For Quick Diaper Changes
description: Cats Meow - Cat Lovers Baby Onesie or Infant Shirt
No need to worry about quality, our Gift Quality baby onesies are made from very soft, thick, 100% cotton that will not overstretch and lose its shape after washing.

At CarefreeTees we love babies and funny baby sayings! Our cute Baby Onesie Cat Lover shirt would make a unique babyshower gift that is guaranteed to be a hit at the baby shower. For a Baby Boy or a Baby Girl.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "9 x 6 x 0.5 inches; 2 Ounces", "Department": "unisex-baby", "Date First Available": "May 11, 2014"}
